adjectives.description: industrializing (comparative more industrializing, superlative most industrializing)

entries.meaning: That is undergoing industrialisation; becoming more industrial.
examples: [T]he Lunar Society of Birmingham […] aimed to develop knowledge useful to an industrialising society and included among its luminaries the potter Josiah Wedgwood (1730–95), the physician William Withering (1741–99), the chemist Joseph Priestly and James Watt.
